title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Nov 24 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Nov 24 2021
description:
Clay and Buck get into a heated debate about the best Thanksgivings foods. And Clay (who likes turkey so much he eats turkey and cheese sandwiches daily) compares ex-CIA officer Buck's gluten-free stuffing to the shock if James Bond admitted to such needed substitutions. NBC News: Charge your guests for Thanksgiving dinner. Incredulous Clay says call it the "Biden tax." EIB Caller Helpline: How do deal with liberal family members and have a peaceful Thanksgiving. Radio host Jesse Kelly gives C&B his controversial take on turkey. Live coverage of the verdict of 3 "murderers", says Buck, in the Ahmaud Arbery case. Why are so many vaccinated people ending up in the hospital? Climate change superfan, Nancy Pelosi, flees high-tax California and buys $25 million beachfront home in the state most hated by liberals, zero income tax Florida.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
